changelog:
Mod is no longer in beta due to crashes being drastically reduced finally.
- Significantly reduces amount of crashes by removing ~20 doors (Don't ask me why the game cares about this)
- Music should no longer suddenly change when you step between carriages briefly
- Imports Mads Mikkelsen voiceset from AOM
- Slight furniture/prop changes (New couch and closet in office area, removed some luggage blocking seats)
- Fixes Constant carriage doors clipping through wall
- Adds more bodydumping windows to first two carriages
- Fixes a bathroom mirror apparently (did it over half a year ago)
